analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs in Direct Opposition
The Dyad on Contaminated and Uncontaminated

original: Nakilesasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kilesa sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kilesa sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-contaminated and uncontaminated state as condition, a non-contaminated and uncontaminated state arises, a root-cause condition.

original: Nakilesavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakilesavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kilesa vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kilesa vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a non-contaminated and uncontaminated state as condition, a non-contaminated and uncontaminated state arises, a root-cause condition. … three.

original: Nakilesasampayuttañca nakilesavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesa sampayuttam ca na kilesa vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesa sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-contaminated and uncontaminated and a non-contaminated and uncontaminated state as condition, a non-contaminated and uncontaminated state arises, a root-cause condition. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
translated: With a root-cause as condition, five … With an object as condition, two … With a nutriment as condition, one … With an element as condition, one … With a sense-sphere as condition, five. (In all cases in detail.)
